ygData.subject: Re: enchanter only robes
ygData.msgSnippet: Looks like Netscape stuffed up the msg :)  anyway I quite like wearing robes as well you can tell i am a magic user....but which class since all High elf s
ygData.messageBody:
Looks like Netscape stuffed up the msg :) anyway I quite like wearing
robes as well you can tell i am a magic user....but which class since
all High elf's have green robes :)

Thanks anyway.

Wanderer CommonWealth wrote:

> ya know there is a robe out there that has +5 charisma which is very
> useful for enchanters more useful than a +2 mana. It's a tunic looks
> like you have nothing on you can buy it for about 2pp-3pp depends on
> your charisma. Send me an e-mail if oyu would like to know where it
> is. wanderercw@... The Wanderer --- "Farr, Robert" wrote: >
> From: "Farr, Robert" > > The stats are the same, it is just a robe
> unique to > our class. > > > -----Original Message----- > > From:
> Freedom [SMTP:sysgod@...] > > Sent: Tuesday, July 06, 1999
> 7:45 PM > > To: eqenchanters@onelist.com > > Subject: Re:
> [eqenchanters] enchanter only robes > > > > In Felwithe the robe is
> not enchanter only but the > jr and senior > > apprentice robes are no
> trade no drop and the > senior is 6 ac and +1mana > > what are the
> stats on the gold one. > > > > Sloop wrote: > > > > > Although I could
> by this point easily have an > FBR or something of the > > > sort, I
> stick with my Gold Senior Apprentice > robe, just because it's > > >
> enchanter only. Think of it as 'Enchanter > Pride'. I think that there
> > > > should be some decent enchanter only robes, > which of course
> would be > > > quest items, and no trade/ no drop, and lore. > This
> goes for the other > > > spellcasting classes as well.-Sloop > > > >
